Package <Unnamed>

Interface Summary
Filter Filter provides an interface for which to transform data in a Relation as it is processed.
 

Class Summary
Controller Orchestrates the program activities.
CountFilter Counts every row into a new row number such that for every row each row will be uniquely incremented.
DistinctFilter DistinctFilter ensures that a row is distinct on a column (or on the row as a whole) depending on its initialization.
Driver Abstract class Driver - Can be any type of data model driver.
FilterView Write a description of class FiltersView here.
LimitFilter Processes row output until an arbitrary number of rows is returned.
MainView MainView creates the command-line prompt view for the application and dispatches program logic to more specific command-line views.
OmitFilter The OmitFilter omits rows in a Relation by a discriminating column/cell-value pair.
ProjectFilter The ProjectFilter limits or arranges columns in a Relation so that the output Rows in the Relation are limited or rearranged from their inputs.
Relation Relation is created for data queries.
RelationView RelationView holds view logic for managing Relation objects.
RestrictFilter The RestrictFilter restricts rows in a Relation by a discriminating column/cell-value pair.
ReverseFilter Materializes the result set in memory and reverses the set.
Row Row is the part of Relation for each table row.
SkipFilter Inhibits row output until an arbitrary number of rows is skipped.
SortFilter Sorts rows based on the cell input(s) used as a key.
TildeDriver Data driver suitable for Tilde Table.
